name: Jimmy Hart
biography: Jimmy Hart was born on March 14, 1969 in Los Angeles, California, USA as Alan James Weisman. He is known for his work on Avengers: Endgame (2019), Avengers: Infinity War (2018) and Captain America: Civil War (2016). He is married to Jessica. They have two children.::Anonymous
trivia: Son of legendary Stuntman/Actor Bill Hart.
filmography: A Million Ways to Die in the West
